      • set2HopRouting

        public void set2HopRouting(boolean twoHopEnabled)
        Sets whether or not 2 Hop Routing will be enabled.
        Parameters:
        twoHopEnabled - Boolean value if true 2 Hop Routing will be enabled, if false 2 Hop Routing will be disabled.
